description: The `ballerinax/sap.s4hana.api_inspectionlot_srv` package offers APIs for seamless integration with the [Inspection Lot API v1.2.0](https://api.sap.com/api/API_INFORECORD_PROCESS_SRV/overview).In the SAP system, you process quality inspections on the basis of inspection lots. The data relating to a quality inspection is grouped into several entities. With this service it is possible, for example, to update inspection lot header data or to create inspection results and usage decisions.
